intro: It's a trainer carrying tons of Pokémon Eggs!
intro_dialogue:
Hey there, trainer!$It looks like some of your
partner Pokémon are feeling a little down.$Why not have a battle with me to cheer them up?
title: The Expert Pokémon Breeder
description:
You've been challenged to a battle where @[TOOLTIP_TITLE]{you can only use a single Pokémon}. It might be tough, but it would surely deepen the bond you have with the Pokémon you choose!
The breeder will also give you some @[TOOLTIP_TITLE]{Pokémon Eggs} if you win!
outro: Look how happy your {{chosenPokemon}} is now!$Here, you can have these as well.
outro_failed:
How disappointing...$It looks like you still have a long way
to go to earn your Pokémon's trust!
